texts.my_address: 20/6 Kha Van Can Street, Hiep Binh Chanh Ward, Thu Duc District, Ho Chi Minh City.
texts.my_about: I am a Flutter developer with expertise in UI/UX design for web and mobile applications. I constantly strive to improve my skills in building intuitive and accessible experiences, ensuring smooth and responsive applications through performance optimization. I also utilize GetX for state management in my Flutter projects. Additionally, I learn Node.js for backend development, utilizing cloud services like AWS (S3, Cloudfront) and Cloudinary for managing storage and media. I'm actively improve caching data with Redis, learning RabbitMQ to further enhance my backend capabilities.
texts.my_frontend: Flutter (Web, Android): Building a Responsive Website/Android App with Flutter using Getx at State manager, custom theme, multi language app
texts.my_soft_skill: Creativity, Problem Solving, Adopting Innovation, Self-Motivation.
